summary: This mod changes the appearance of companion guild members. This will be a mod that will be updated on a regular basis. With new variants, options and custom followers.
descriptionHtml:
$$$$$$$$ NEWS $$$$$$$$
CHECK THIS AMAZING MOD OUT! 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23755]Inhabitants of Skyrim Npc Overhaul by Rops1981[/url]
It will transform the faces of your Skyrim for the better.

version 1.2 update ####NO MORE REQUIREMENTS####
****Now hairs and eyes are stand alone just use your favorite body type and face textures.****
Aela has been redone with new hair and warpaint. Thanks to urshi for the hair fix and TairenSoul for providing the warpaint.
Njada face tweak and new warpaint.
Ria new warpaint and some face tweaks.
Both characters are sporting warpaints by beeto
All characters have new eyes. Thanks to LogRamm for  allowing me to use their eyes from The Eyes of Beauty.
Aela Ria Athis njada all have stand alone hairs provided by apachii and radioragae. 
Big thanks to Diethardt for the upscaled face tints!

Recommended mods but not required.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27815]Fine Face Textures by urshi[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26145]Smooth male Body Normal Maps[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25211]Female Face Tattoo by TairenSoul[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25791]Male Face Tattoo by TairenSoul[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]Eyes Of Beauty[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3574]Gizmodian Scars[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12933]Exstensible Follower Framework[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6953]Better FaceGen[/url]

**** Instructions for neck seam/tear bug ****
1. Open console `
2. Target specific npc and you will type
For Aela - setnpcweight 30
For Athis - setnpcweight 40
For Torvar - setnpcweight 100
For Ria - setnpcweight 30
For Njada - setnpcweight 30
For Skjor - setnpcweight 100
3. disable
4. enable
5. Save
6. Rinse/repeat
You now need to use the exact weight as used in the ck for this to actually work now.

Try my other mods.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23779]The Dovakiins New Allies[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22616]The Hirelings[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22524]The Companions by Netherwalk[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21540]Vilkas and Farkas[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21749]Vizerin by Netherwalk[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22155]Housecarls by Netherwalk[/url]

Want your Skyrim to look like mine? try out these amazing ENBs I personally use. You can see them at work in my galleries and screenshots.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23812]Seasons of Skyrim[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20741]Synergy/Dark[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21350]Winterheart 2[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21123]The Wilds[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24828]Bleak/Unbleak[/url]

Credit and thanks go the following for granting permission to include their wonderful work into mine.
LogRamm 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]The Eyes Of beauty[/url]
Apachii
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]
radioragae
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18110]Oblivion Hair Packs Female[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17993]Oblivion Hair Packs Male[/url]
beeto
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20920]Night Elf Warpaint[/url]

Special thanks go to my dear friends urshi and TairenSoul for all the help and work they put into this mod and all my other mods.
author: netherwalk
